subject: Merry, Merry
event: Here's wishing a Merry Christmas and Joyous Yule to all my friends and readers.

comments.upictitle: misha the little black rain cloud: embrace
comments.article: And to you and yours, sir. :)

comments.upictitle: маленький цЫфровой ревербератор Michael Lyahovich: баран
comments.article:
Same to You from Moscow, Russia ;)
Best wishes and good luck ;)
Merry Christmas from northern Illinois.  Go Bears! :P

Merry Christmas to you, too, Mr. Martin. And a Happy New Year.

The weather's beautiful in Phoenix today; I have just one Christmas brunch to attend, and then the rest of the day is mine. I plan to crack out a few books, some spiked eggnog, and A Christmas Story to unwind. Hope you have something equally relaxing planned!

--Kris
Merry Christmas also from Phoenix!  :)
Bah! Humbu-- No, no, not this time. A Merry Christmas back at you!
Merry Yule from southern Arizona
Merry Christmas! :D
And back to you... may the holidays bring you as much joy as you've brought to all of us!
Same to you!

Merry Christmas and a fabulous New Year to you and Parris.

--Carrie
Merry Christmas!  I gave five copies of Game of Thrones to various people as gifts this year.  :D  I wish you and yours the happiest and healthiest holiday!
MERRY CHRISTMAS GRRM!
And Merry Christmas to you George!
God Jul from Sweden!

And a Merry Christmas from London, England.

My fiance and I bought each other copies (thankfully different ones) of some of your "lesser known" titles, it was very amusing.
And the very same to you, sir.  May the new year bring you many good and inspiring things.

And a joyous yule to you, G!

~ Chelle
The best of the season to you and your lady! I'm going to try to be in Boston -- depends on when my best friend decides to give birth -- and if I am, I hope to see you both there.
Merry Christmas and a happy new year from a little town on the Welsh border. I'm looking forward to my reread of ASOIAF in the new year :D
Merry Christmas from Centralia, Missouri!
Merry Christmas!

comments.upictitle: Save the Cheerleader, Save the World: winter is coming
comments.article: Merry Christmas! :D
Thank you Mr. Martin, and Merry Christmas to you.  And let's go Jets!

Merry Christmas, George.

Thanks for another year of great reading.
Hyvää Joulua from up North to you too :)

happy yule to you!!
